insert into ehr_rule (rulesName, clockInNum, amStartTime, amEndTime, pmStartTime, pmEndTime, clockInIocation, instructions, emp_id, logictoDelete) values (#{rulesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockinnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockiniocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instructions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logictodelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ehr_rule set rulesName = #{rulesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clockInNum = #{clockinnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amStartTime = #{amstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amEndTime = #{amendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pmStartTime = #{pmstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pmEndTime = #{pmendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clockInIocation = #{clockiniocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instructions = #{instructions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logictoDelete = #{logictodelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, rulesName, clockInNum, amStartTime, amEndTime, pmStartTime, pmEndTime, clockInIocation, instructions, emp_id, logictoDelete from ehr_rule where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
